Senator Mike Enzi, R-Wyo., has a message for small business owners and employees during these difficult times: "Hang on, help is on the way."

Speaking on the Senate floor, Enzi highlighted a portion of the third package the Senate is working on in response to the COVID-19 crisis that would help small businesses stay afloat and provide ways for employers to keep their employees.

Senator Mike Enzi, R-Wyo., released the following statement after a federal judge in Montana ruled against a Bureau of Land Management (BLM) directive and invalidated oil and gas leases in Montana and Wyoming: 

"I am disappointed in the federal judge's decision to side with environmental activists on this issue," Enzi said.
